item.title: Trustworthiness
item.description: High availability High availability cluster redundant, eliminate single points do failure Heartbeat, monitor the healthy and status of each node in the cluster. node configuration: active / active active / passive N + 1 failover strategies High reliability availability service high availability Database high availability backup backup everyday Data recovery disaster recovery planning privacy data masking Security Resilience Safety
